meanings.definition: The act of exposing something to something again.
meanings.sent1: After the initial presentation, the reexposure of the information helped reinforce the concept.
meanings.sent2: The reexposure to sunlight caused the colors to fade over time.
meanings.sent3: The reexposure of the old photograph brought back memories of the past.
meanings.sent4: The reexposure to the same allergen triggered a stronger reaction this time.
meanings.sent5: The reexposure to the story made it even more captivating the second time around.

meanings.definition: The state of being exposed to something again.
meanings.sent1: The reexposure to the virus led to a second infection.
meanings.sent2: The reexposure to the cold weather made her shiver uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: His reexposure to the movie plot twist left him just as shocked as the first time.
meanings.sent4: The reexposure to the same argument reignited the debate among friends.
meanings.sent5: The reexposure to the painting revealed new details previously unnoticed.
